319763.「夜が明けたばっかりの時は\n ゆっくり見る余裕が なかったけど\n メネト村っ:
We didn't really get a chance to look around
after the sun had just come up, but Menet
Village really is peaceful, isn't it?

319764.「長い夜が明け ようやく太陽が昇ったのだ。\n 今年のコッケン祭りは\n 盛大に:
After the long, long night...the sun has
finally risen. We must celebrate this year's
Cuckoo Festival spectacularly!

319765.「そのためにも 急ぎ準備を進めてくれ。\n 皆の者 頼んだぞい！:
For that, you should all hurry and prepare.
I know you can do it!

319767.「こんにちは ティセちゃん！\n 近いうち お祭りでもあるの？\n 村のみんなが:
Hello, Tise! Are you all having some kind
of festival soon? Everyone in the village
looks a bit busy.

319768.「うん！ メネト村では 種まきの時期になると\n 太陽への感謝と 豊穣を願って\:
Yeah! Here in the village, we hold the Cuckoo
Festival to give thanks to the sun, and to
wish for a good year's harvest.

319769.「コッケン様っていうのは 村に古くから伝わる\n ニワトリの神様で 太陽のお使い:
The Great Cuckoo is the ancient rooster god
of our village, and the messenger of the sun.
So, we honor him and pray for a good harvest.

319770.「やっと太陽が昇ったし ロナ長老は\n 今年は盛大にやるぞって 張り切ってるみた:
The sun's finally come up, and Elder Rona
seems really excited to celebrate it in a big
way this year.

319771.「私ね 眠っていた時に トープスと一緒に\n コッケン祭りに 行くって約束したん:
You know...Tohpes promised me we'd go to the
festival together when I was asleep. If this
keeps up, he won't make it in time...

319772.「あれからずっと トープスを捜してるんだけど\n この村の周辺には いないみたい:
I've been looking for him ever since then, but he's nowhere to be found in the village. I can't really search farther than that on my
own, either...

319773.「<pc>さんたちは 見ていない？\n きっと <pc>さんたちは ゼニアスの\:
Have any of you seen him? You've been to a
lot of different places in Zeniath, right?

319774.「ううん……。\n あたしたちも トーくんを 見ていないの。\n 今日来たのは:
Uh uh... We haven't seen Toh either.
There's another reason why we came here.

319775.<pc>は ティセに\nメネト村の 守護天使を\n捜しにきたのだと 説明した。:
<pc> explains to Tise that they
had come looking for a Guardian Angel in Menet
Village.

319776.「この村のみんなが 眠っていた時でも\n なぜか トーくんだけ 目覚めていたし\:
Even when everyone in the village was asleep,
somehow only Toh was still awake. He had
that strange Dream Censer, too.

319777.「きっと トーくんこそがこの村の\n 守護天使を見つけるカギだと 思うんだ。:
I'm betting that Toh is the key to finding
the Guardian Angel here.

319778.「それに あれからずっと 消えたトーくんのこと\n 心配だった。このまま 放って:
Besides...I've been worried about him since
he disappeared. I can't just leave things like
this. I absolutely have to find him!

319779.「ずっと……考えていたんだけど……\n みんな 宵と暁の伝承を 覚えているかい？:
I've...been thinking... Do you all remember
the legend of the dusk and dawn? There was
this passage inside...

319780.「まれびと みんなの ねむりをみはる。 \n おやまのしんでん まもりのとりで。:
"The divine being watched over all asleep. In the mountain's temple, the guardian bird protected them. Capturing their nightmares,
they slept as one."

319781.「……この伝承のまれびと というのは\n 守護天使のことじゃないかと 思うんだ。:
...I suspect that the legend's "divine being"
is the Guardian Angel. If that's the case,
then they may be at the temple.

319782.「あれ？ いま 宵と暁の伝承って言ったよね？\n 私の知ってる宵と暁の伝承と 違:
Huh? Was that the legend of the dusk and dawn
just now? It's different from the one I know.
The one I know goes like this...

319783.「まれびと おそらに まほうをかけた。\n たいようのぼって おひさまさんさん。:
"The divine being cast a spell over the sky.
The sun rises, shining brightly.
The grass and flowers all rejoice."

319784.「まれびと こんどは ニワトリよんだ。\n ニワトリなくと みんなは げんき。\:
"The divine being, now called a rooster. When the rooster crows, everyone is happy. Celebrating the sunrise, and preparing the
festival."

319785.「まれびと みんなと まつりをいわう。\n おどりをおどって たのしいきぶん。\:
"The divine being celebrates with us all.
Dancing, and feeling much joy.
Returning to sleep at the mountain temple."

319786.「ニワトリねむれば たいようしずむ。\n つきよになれば みんなも ねむる。\n:
"When the rooster sleeps, the sun sets.
On the moonlit night, all will sleep too.
Even in dreams, happiness continues."

319787.「ああ？ どういうことだ？\n オレたちが聞いてた 宵と暁の伝承と\n 全然ちが:
Huh? What's all that about? That's nothing
like the legend we heard last time.

319788.「そんな馬鹿な！ 僕たちは 伝承について\n 記された本を ロナ長老から預かって:
That's absurd! We have a book of the legend
that Elder Rona gave to us! If you'd just
read it...

319789.「本の内容が……変わってる……。\n いったい 何が起きているんだ……？:
The book...it's changed...?
What is going on here...?

319790.「と とりあえず……<pc>も\n 内容を 確認したいだろうから \n この本は:
A...anyways. Here, <pc>.
I think you'll want to check as well,
so please take this.

319791.<pc>は\n宵と暁の伝承の本（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！ <me_60:
<pc> received the
Legend of the Dusk and Dawn (Key Item)!<me_60>

319792.「ティセさんの教えてくれた 宵と暁の伝承でも\n まれびとは 神殿に戻ると言って:
I think we should go to the Temple of Twilight for the time being. The legend Tise told us says the divine being will return to the
temple.

319793.「それなら 私も連れてって！: Then, please take me with you!

319794.「あっ……でも ごめん！\n 行くのは 明日にしてもいいかな。:
Oh, but...I'm sorry! Can we go tomorrow
instead?

319795.「ママはいつも 村の外は危険だっていうの。\n だから <pc>さんたちと一緒な:
Mama says it's pretty dangerous outside the
village. I'll try to convince her tonight that
I'll be safe if I'm with you all!

319796.「うん！ 一緒に行こ！\n 友達のピンチは 放っておけないよね！:
Yeah! Let's go together! We can't leave our
friends behind!

319797.「んじゃ 決まりだな。\n さっさと 宿屋でひと眠りしようぜ。:
Guess it's decided, then. Might as well
head to the inn for a quick nap.

320288.「ちっ……門番が変わっちまった時から\n 予想はしていたが……神殿の中も\n 以:
Tch...I saw this coming as soon as I saw
the gatekeeper was different...the inside
is completely different than last time.

320289.「とりあえず 手探りで進んでみるしかないか。\n まずは そーっと いっぽ……:
For now, we'll just have to keep moving.
First, let's make sure we tread careful...

320291.「うえええぇっ！？\n つ ついに 金色のニワトリが\n 出てきちゃったよ！？:
Whaaaaat?! What's this golden rooster
doing here?!

320293.「その暗闇に トサカの先 ちょっとでも\n 触れてみろッ！ ヒトの子である お前:
Touch that darkness with even the tip of
your toe, and you mortals will be dragged
into an inescapable nightmare!!

320294.「ああ……？\n お前の その偉そうなしゃべり方\n どっかで聞いた覚えが ある:
Huh...? That pompous way of talking, I
recognize it from somewhere...

320295.「もしかして 神殿の入り口で\n オレたちを試した あの門番ニワトリの本体か？:
You're the gatekeeper who tested us at the
entrance, aren't you? So you're just a
rooster, then?

320296.「ええいッ！ 頭が高い！\n ただのニワトリと思ったら 大間違いだッ！:
Cluck! So arrogant! Thinking I'm some mere
rooster is a big mistake!

320297.「吾輩は 偉大なる守護天使様の \n 最も忠実にして 優秀なるしもべ！\n 暁の:
I am the most faithful and fabulous servant of
the great Guardian Angel! The messenger of
dawn: the Great Cuckoo!!!

320298.「ええっ？ コッケン様！？\n それって もしかして コッケン祭りの\n あの:
Huh?! The Great Cuckoo?! The one from the
Cuckoo Festival? THAT Cuckoo?

320299.「うむ いかにも そのコッケンなり！\n 吾輩は メネトの守護者として ご主人様:
Yes, indeed, that Cuckoo! As Menet's
protector, I was entrusted by my master
to guard the gate of this temple!

320300.「だが……このコッケン 一生の不覚ッ！\n 外からの守りにばかり 徹しておったら:
However...a lifetime of shame, I have!
Only focusing on the defense from outside,
enemies lurk inside the temple...

320301.「おかげで 聖なる神殿は この有様！\n 吾輩は なんとしても 悪しき者に囚われ:
And now, the temple is in shambles! I must
do everything I can to save the master from
being captured by the evil one...

320302.「悲しいかな 吾輩ひとりでは 不可能ッ！\n だからこそ 吾輩は 入り口でお前ら:
Unfortunately, it is impossible for me to do
by my lonesome! That is why I judged your
trustworthiness at the entrance of the temple!

320303.「吾輩は お前らを 信じることにした！\n 特に そこの マヌケ面の お前ッ！\:
I have decided to place my trust in you! Especially you! With the stupid looking face! I sense a remarkable positive energy from
you!

320304.「あはは！ よかったね <pc>。\n 新たなファン 獲得だよ！:
Haha! Isn't that great, <pc>?
You've got a new fan!

320305.「しかし 愚か！ あまりにも愚かじゃッ！\n 悪しき者相手に 無策で突っ込むなど:
But how foolish! TOO foolish! To recklessly charge in without a plan against such wicked foes... Without me, you'd be
destroyed in but an instant!

320306.「だが 喜ぶがいい！ ご主人様のもとまで\n 吾輩が チカラを貸してやろうではな:
But, rejoice! I shall lend you my assistance
in reaching my master! A great honor
befitting mortals such as yourselves!

320307.「それが モノを頼む 態度かよ？\n 要は お前も ヘマこいたから\n 神殿が:
Is that how you ask for things? Point is...
you screwed up too, and now the temple
is like this because of it, right?

320308.「どうも 信用できねえなぁ。\n こいつ 本当に 役に立つのか？\n うるさいだ:
I don't trust you. Are you actually gonna be
useful to us, I wonder? If you don't keep
quiet, I'll just yank out your tailfeathers.

320309.「無礼者！ なんじゃ そのクチのききかたは！\n お前こそ 魚のようなヒレを つ:
How RUDE! How dare you speak to me like that?!
You! With fins like a fish! The pot calling
the kettle black!

320311.「まあいい！ ならば吾輩のチカラ\n とくと 見ておるがいい！\n コホン……。:
Well, fine! Let me show you, then, what I
can do! Cluh-HUCK...

320313.「わあ すごい！\n コケちゃんの鳴き声で 眠っていた柱が起きて\n 明かりが:
Wow, amazing! Kookie's crow woke up that
sleeping pillar, and the light came on!

320314.「それに……明かりが ともったおかげで\n 通路の暗闇が晴れて 歩いても 大丈夫:
And that light...it cleared the darkness in
this passage, so it's safe to walk through
now!

320315.「ただの柱ではないぞ。こやつらも\n 立派な この神殿の眷属どもじゃ。:
They are no ordinary pillars. They are also
fine servants of this temple.

320316.「本来ならば 神殿の廊下を照らし\n 警護しているはずが 悪しき者に襲われ\n:
The corridors in this temple are normally all
lit and protected, but after the evil one's
attack...they are all asleep.

320317.「ご主人様は 神殿のいちばん奥に\n 囚われておる。そこまで 吾輩の鳴き声で\n:
The master lies trapped in the deepest reaches
of the temple. You must awaken the pillars
with my crowing and make your way there.

320318.「眠っている柱の前に 吾輩を連れていくがいい！\n 日の出のごとき 強烈な鳴き声:
Bring me before the sleeping pillars! I will wake them with a mighty crow like the rising sun, and I will illuminate the
darkness!

320319.「それでは ご主人様のもとへ！\n いざ 出発進行じゃ！！:
Now, then! Let us make haste to the master!
Forward march!

320322.「まさか……ティセ？\n どうやって ここまで……！？:
What...Tise, is that you?
How did you get here...?!

320323.「誰が そんな場所に閉じ込めたの！？\n そこから すぐ 出してあげるからね！:
Who would keep you in a place like this?!
Hold on, we're going to get you out of
there!

320325.「こっちに 来ちゃだめだ！\n すぐに逃げて！ あいつが……:
Don't come any closer! You need to run, now!
He's...

320327.「せっかく 気持ちよく寝てたのに\n 起きちまったじゃねえかあ……。:
And I was sleeping so soundly, too...
But now you've woken me up...

320329.「ふわ～ああ……。\n ぬし様に 見張りを頼まれたけどよぉ……\n おりゃ～退屈:
Yaaawn... I was asked to keep guard, but...
Nngh, it was so boring I couldn't help
but fall asleep...

320330.「逃げてなくて よかったぁ。\n イイ子で そこに入ってろよぉ？:
I'm so glad you didn't get away.
Be a good boy and stay put, oookay?

320332.「許せない！\n あんたが トープスを 閉じ込めてたのね！:
How could you?! So you're the one who locked
him in there?!

320333.「ああ～ん？\n お前……見覚えがあるぞぉ？\n メネト村で 花に囲まれてたヤツ:
Huuuuh? You...look familiar...
The one from Menet surrounded by flowers...?

320335.「ヒヒヒ……。\n 眠ってる時は けっこう かわいかったけどよぉ\n しゃべると:
Hee hee hee... You were quite cute when you
were asleep... But awake and running your
mouth, you're quite the cheeky one...

320336.「やっぱ ぬし様の言うとおりだなぁ～。\n 人間どもは 悪夢に苦しんでる時のが\:
I guess the master was right...humans are
muuuuuch better when they're suffering from
their own nightmares...

320337.「ちっ……胸糞悪い野郎だ。\n おい ふたりとも オレの後ろに隠れてろ。:
Tch...what a disgusting creep.
Hey, you two. Stay behind me.

320338.「おりゃ あくむにゅうどうってんだ。\n お前らに もう一度 最悪の悪夢を\n:
I am the Nightmare Nomad! I will show you your
worst nightmares once mooooore!

320341.「ああ～！ びっくりした……。\n そうか お前がいたっけなぁ……。:
Ahhh... You gave me quite the startle...
I see... So it's you...

320342.「せっかく 悪夢を見せても\n お前がいると すぐに\n 目覚めさせちまうんだっ:
Even if I had given them nightmares,
you'd just wake them up straight away...

320343.「しゃーねぇなぁ～。\n めんどくさいけど お前ら全員\n 殺すしか なさそうだ:
Oh, well... It's a pain, but I guess I'll
just have to kill you all...

320345.「吾輩が チカラを貸せるのは ここまで！\n あの不届き者を ぶちのめして\n:
This is far as I'm able to assist you! Crush
that insolent fool and save my master!

320346.「ここは 僕が 戦うから\n ヒューザは ふたりを頼んだよ。\n それじゃ いこ:
I'll handle the fighting here. Hyuza, take
good care of those two.
Come on, <cs_pchero>!!

320347.「お前ら めっちゃ つよいのなぁ……。\n あとは……ぬし様 頼みますわぁ……。:
You're...really strong...
The rest, I leave...to you...master...

320349.「ティセ……来てくれて ありがとう。 \n 俺のチカラだけじゃ どうしても\n:
Tise...thank you for coming here.
My strength just wasn't enough to get
out of there myself.

320350.「ご主人様……ご無事でなによりです！\n 神殿の中が 突如 悪夢に侵略された時は:
Master... I'm relieved to see you safe and
sound! When nightmares invaded the temple,
it was a chilling sight to behold!!

320351.「ですが……ご主人様。\n まるで ただの人間のような\n そのお姿は いったい:
But, master... Your appearance is that of a
mere human... What is going on...?

320352.「見ての通りだよ。もう 俺には\n 悪夢に対抗するチカラなど 残っていない。\n:
It's pretty plain to see. I no longer have the strength to fight back those nightmares. So, I suppose I can't go back to how I
was before.

320353.「もとの姿……？ どういうこと？: How you were before...? What do you mean?

320354.「混乱させてごめんね。ティセ。\n 俺は メネト村の守護天使 トープス。\n メ:
Sorry if I confused you, Tise. I am the
Guardian Angel Tohpes of Menet Village.
It was me who put the village to sleep.

320355.「やっぱり……君が 守護天使だったんだね。:
I knew it...so you were the Guardian Angel
after all.

320356.「うん……。はるか昔 俺たち守護天使は\n 滅びゆくゼニアスから 自らの守護する:
Yes... A long time ago, we Guardian Angels
sought to protect our respective peoples
from a dying Zeniath by our own means.

320357.「俺は メネト村のみんなを いつか\n 救いが訪れる時まで 眠らせることにした。:
My decision was to put everyone in Menet
Village to sleep until salvation one day came.
I made sure they didn't age as they slept.

320358.「しばらくは それでよかったんだ。\n でも メネトのみんなが 悪夢を見るように:
And for a while, it was good. But things
changed when everyone in the village began
to have nightmares...

320359.「この地に ジア・クトが襲ってきた時の\n 恐怖の記憶が みんなの心を蝕んで\n:
The memories of the Dia Kut's horrific attack on this land...it consumed everyone's hearts and over time, manifested into
nightmares.

320360.「そして 長い年月の間……皆の夢の中で\n くり返された悪夢は やがて 実体を得:
And over time...those nightmares eventually
took a shape of their own, and became
real.

320361.「俺は 何度も その悪夢を消し去ったけど\n 悪夢は よみがえって 村のみんなを:
Many times did I try to make the nightmares
go away, but they just kept coming back.
In the process, I myself became exhausted...

320362.「最後は仕方なく 自分と一緒に 悪夢を\n そこの棺桶に封印し 眠りについたんだ:
In the end, I had no choice but to seal the nightmares alongside myself in that coffin, and fall asleep. After that, I too was consumed
by them.

320363.「以前 眠ったメネト村で 君たちと出会った\n 無力な俺は 守護天使の俺が見てい:
When I met you back when Menet was asleep, I was powerless, and wandered through dreams that the Guardian Angel version
of me was watching.

320364.「なるほど……だから 以前の君は\n 棺桶の中の君が 目覚めることによって\n:
I see... So that's why the previous you
suddenly disappeared when the version of
you inside the coffin woke up.

320365.「じゃあ メネト村のみんなを 黒い影にしたのは\n キミと一緒に 棺桶で眠ってい:
So...the black shadows that are affecting everyone in the village...those are the nightmares that should've been asleep
with you in that coffin...right?

320366.「ああ。メネトの悪夢は 皆が 悪夢を見るたび\n 強大になっていった……。今では:
Yeah. Each time someone in the village has a nightmare, it becomes stronger... And now, with my strength depleted, I'm no match
for it anymore.

320367.「ごめんよ ティセ。\n すべての元凶は……この俺だ。:
I'm sorry, Tise...
This is all...because of me.

320368.「だから 俺は 自分のせいで生まれてしまった\n メネトの悪夢を 倒さなきゃいけ:
That's why I have to defeat the Nightmare of
Menet! I am the reason it exists. That is
the only way I can atone for what I did...

320369.「なのに……俺には もう\n 守護天使のチカラが 残っていない……。\n 今の俺:
And yet...I no longer have the power of a
Guardian Angel left... I'm just some
helpless little kid now...

320371.「チカラなら ここにあるじゃない！\n ティセちゃんの 花冠に！！:
If it's power you're looking for, it's right
here! Inside Tise's flower crown!

320373.「あたし ずっと不思議に思ってたの。\n メネト村が悪夢に襲われた時 どうして\:
I was wondering how Tise was the only one
who wasn't affected by the nightmares in
the village.

320374.「その花冠の おかげだったんだよ！\n だって それから すっごく強い\n 創生:
It was all thanks to that flower crown!
Because ever since, I've felt an amazingly
strong power of creation!

320375.「夢の中でも ティセさんを 守ろうと\n チカラを込めて花冠を 作ったのだろうね:
Even in his dreams, he must've put all his strength into making that crown to protect Tise. That being said, then I think you
should return the crown to him...

320376.「わかった！\n この花冠 大好きだったけど あなたに返すよ。\n 受け取って…:
I got it! I loved this flower crown so much,
but now I'm giving it back to you. Here,
Tohpes!

320378.「そのお姿を拝見するのは 何万年ぶりですかな。\n よくぞ……よくぞ お戻りにな:
It's been tens of thousands of years since I
last saw that form. Welcome back...
Welcome back, indeed. Guardian Angel, Tophes.

320379.「ティセや ポルテ……みんなのおかげで\n 俺はやっと 守護天使に 戻ることがで:
Tise, Porte... Everyone... It's thanks to you
all that I'm finally able to be a Guardian
Angel again. Thank you so much...

320381.「あれほど濃かった闇が 一気に晴れた……。\n さすがは 守護天使様といった感じ:
Such a thick darkness, extinguished in an
instant... As to be expected from a Guardian
Angel.

320382.「これで この神殿は もう安全だよ。\n さて 次は メネト村のみんなを\n 助:
The temple is safe again. Now, we have to
return to the village and save everyone.

320383.「いでよ！ 悪夢への夢路よ！: Come forth! A path to the nightmare!

320384.「メネト村の皆が 囚われている悪夢の世界へ\n 道をつないだよ。ここから メネト:
I've connected a path to the world of nightmares where everyone in the village is now trapped. It's there that we'll put
a stop to the Nightmare of Menet.

320385.「吾輩がお供できるのは ここまでです。\n この神殿を 守護しなければなりません:
This is as far as I'm able to go. I must
protect this temple. I wish you the best
of luck, Tohpes!

320386.「<cs_pchero>！ これは夢だ！\n 取り込まれちゃいけない！！:
<cs_pchero>! This is just a dream!
Don't let it consume you!

320389.「ちっ……最悪なモン 見せやがって……。: Tch... Showing me something so horrible...

320390.「クックック…………！\n 私の悪夢は 現実と区別がつかないのが\n ウリなんで:
Keheheh! My nightmares are known to be
indistinguishable from reality...

320391.「この広場に入ってきた時から あなたたちはもう\n 私の悪夢に 取り込まれていた:
From the moment you entered this place, you
had already become part of my nightmare.

320392.「さあ今は 現実？ それとも夢かな？\n あなたたちは本当に 目覚めていると思う:
Now, is this real...? Or is it a dream...?
Do you truly believe you are awake?

320393.「お前の悪夢には 屈しない！\n 何度だって 皆を救い出してみせる！:
I will not succumb to your nightmares!
I will save everyone, no matter how many
times I have to!

320394.「ふふふ……。\n 久しぶりですね トープス。\n 天使の姿でのお目見えは いつ:
Heh heh heh... It has been some time, Tohpes.
When was the last time you appeared in
your angelic form?

320395.「あなたが メネト村を眠らせてくれたおかげで\n この私が 生まれたわけですが…:
You put Menet Village into slumber, and in
turn, I came into being. And now, I think
I'd like to do things my way.

320396.「私は 気づいたんです。\n このゼニアス全土が 我が悪夢に沈めば\n 私を邪魔:
I came to a realization. If all of Zeniath is
plunged into my nightmare, then there would
be none left to stand in my way!

320397.「お前との付き合いも 長くなったけれど……\n もう いいかげん ウンザリだよ。:
I've had to deal with you for so long...but
enough is enough. Let's settle this here
and now!

320398.「笑わせてくれますね。この何万年かの間\n メネトの住人が どれほど くり返し\:
Don't make me laugh. How many nightmares
do you think the people of Menet have had
over the last tens of thousands of years?

320399.「そのたびに 私は チカラを増し……\n 今や 私の方が はるかに強大なんですよ:
With each nightmare, I grow stronger... now, I am far more formidable! I will drag you into this nightmare, no matter how many times
I must try!

320401.「トープスくん！ 僕も手伝うよ！\n あいつの悪夢から <cs_pchero>た:
Tohpes! I will assist you! We have to protect
the others from his nightmare!

320402.「んじゃ 今度は オレの出番だな。\n 思いっきり 暴れてやるぜ。:
And now...it's my turn. I'm not gonna hold
back.

320403.「クックック……いいでしょう！ \n 死んだ方が はるかにマシだったと思うような:
Heh, heh, heh...very well! Prepare to witness
a nightmare so gruesome that even death
will seem pleasant!

320404.「ククク……。\n これで……終わりだと\n 思わないでくださいね……。:
Keh heh heh...
Don't think...that this is the
end...

320405.「人々の心に刻まれた 恐怖の記憶がある限り……\n 私は……何度でも よみがえる:
As long as those horrific memories are etched
into people's hearts... I can return, again...
...and again...

320407.「その時は……\n 何度だって 俺が消してやるさ。:
And when it does...
I'll destroy you as many times as it takes!

320409.「ティセ！ よかった……。\n もう 全部終わったから 安心していいよ。\n メ:
Tise! Thank goodness... It's all over now,
so there's no need to worry. Everyone in
the village should be back to normal.

320410.「へへっ……なんだか 天使のトープスって\n 大人っぽくて 変な感じ！:
Hehe... It's kinda weird... The angel Tohpes
is so grown up!

320411.「さあ早く 本当のメネト村に 帰ろうよ！\n きっと 天使のトープスを見たら\n:
Come on, let's hurry to the real Menet!
I'm sure everyone will be so surprised
to see you as an angel!

320412.「ティセ……ごめん。\n 俺はもう 村には戻らない方が いいと思う。:
Tise... I'm sorry.
I don't think it's a good idea that I go
back to the village.

320414.「だって……俺が 村を眠らせていた元凶だった。\n それどころか 悪夢を生み出し:
Because...I was the one that kept the village asleep. Not only that, but I was the cause of the nightmares and inflicted pain on so
many for so long.

320415.「申し訳なくて……とても村には 帰れない。: I'm sorry, but...I can't go back.

320416.「そんな……夢の中で 約束したじゃない！\n 一緒に コッケン祭りに行こうって！:
No way... You promised in my dream! You promised we'd go to the Cuckoo Festival together! Everyone's waiting for you to
come back!

320417.「トープス！ ね！ 一緒に帰ろう？:
Right, Tohpes? Don't you want to go home
together?

320420.「俺は！ いつか ティセたちに\n 豊かな世界で 生きてほしかったから\n 皆を:
It was me! I put the village to sleep because
I wanted you and everyone else to live
in a world of prosperity someday!

320421.「目覚めてしまったら……みんな トシも取る。\n この救いなき大地で 一生を終え:
And if they awaken...they'll all grow old. They'll spend the rest of their lives in this hopeless land. All of this...it was
meaningless...

320422.「んもーーーー！ 怒った！: Grrrr!!! I'm so mad at you!

320423.「ばかトープス！ 天使に戻っても\n 相変わらず ウジウジしてんのね！:
Tophes, you idiot! You may have turned back
into an angel, but you're still as stubborn
as ever!

320424.「あんたこそ いい加減 目を覚ましなさいよ！: It's YOU who needs to wake up already!

320426.「あんたが 村を眠らせたのは\n みんなを 守るためだったんでしょ？\n そんな:
You put everyone to sleep to protect them,
right? If we explain it to them, I'm sure
they'll understand!

320427.「それに たとえ 私たちを守るためでも……\n 眠りつづけてるのって 退屈だった:
Besides, even if it was meant to protect us...
Staying asleep is so boring! It's much more
fun when you're awake!

320428.「このまま メネト村で 一生過ごすことの\n どこが悪いの？ 私は メネト村が大:
What's wrong with spending the rest of your
life in the village? I love it here. I'm sure
everyone else feels the same way, too!

320430.「うん！ 余計なこと言うやつがいたら\n 私が そいつを とっちめてやるから！:
Yes! If anyone talks out of line, I'll just
tell them to be quiet!

320431.「あはは……さすが ティセだ。\n 眠ってるときからずっと ティセは\n 俺の:
Haha... That's just like you, Tise. You've
been my best friend ever since I fell asleep.

320432.「そうよ！ だから 安心して。\n 一緒に メネト村に帰って\n コッケン祭りを:
That's right! So don't worry! Let's go back
to the village and enjoy the Cuckoo
Festival together!

320433.「……ねえ トーくん。\n キミは メネト村を眠らせたことに\n 意味がなかった:
Hey, Toh... You said that putting the village
to sleep was meaningless, right?

320434.「キミが みんなを 眠らせていてくれたからこそ\n あたしたちと 出会うことがで:
Because you kept everyone asleep, we were
able to meet each other! I wouldn't say
that's meaningless!

320435.「そうかも……しれないね。\n へへ……ありがとう。ポルテさん。:
Maybe...maybe you're right.
Hehe... Thank you, Porte.

320436.「ふふっ どういたしまして！ \n それじゃ みんなで一緒に\n メネト村に 帰:
Hehe, you're welcome! Okay, everyone!
Let's go back to the village together!

320437.<pc>たちが メネト村に帰ると\n村の住人は すっかり もとに戻っていた！:
<pc> and co. return to Menet
Village, and all its inhabitants have
returned to normal!

320438.そして 村じゅう大急ぎで\nコッケン祭りの準備が 進められ……:
And so, the whole village rushed to prepare
for the Cuckoo Festival...

320439.ついに ヤドリギ広場にて\nコッケン祭り 当日となった！:
Finally, the day of the Cuckoo Festival held
in the Mistletoe Plaza had come!

320440.「いやはや まさか今年のコッケン祭りには\n 本物のコッケン様が いらしてくださ:
Well, well! To think the true Cuckoo would
grace us at this festival! It's truly an
honor!!

320441.「祭りの準備 ご苦労だった！ メネトの村人よ！\n 吾輩が来たからには メネトの:
Villagers of Menet! Thank you all for your hard work in preparation of the festival! Now that I am here, you can rest assured
Menet's harvest will be quite plentiful!

320443.「うぉっほん！ では！ コッケン様の\n 聖なる鳴き声にて コッケン祭りの開始と:
A-heeem... Let the Cuckoo Festival begin with
the Great Cuckoo's sacred crow! If you would,
o Great Cuckoo!

320446.「いざ コッケン祭りの はじまりじゃ！\n 皆の者 思う存分 食べて飲んで\n:
Now, the Cuckoo Festival has officially begun!
Let us all eat, drink, and enjoy ourselves
to our heart's content!

320447.「はわーー。コケちゃんって 本当に\n コッケン祭りの コッケン様だったんだね。:
Wow... Kookie really WAS the Great Cuckoo
of the festival, huh...

320448.「コッケンは ずっと昔から 太陽の使いとして\n 守護天使と同じくらい……いや:
Since ancient times, Cuckoo has been revered
as a messenger of the sun, much like the
Guardian Angel... No, even more so.

320449.「とはいえ 本物が コッケン祭りに参加するのは\n これまでの歴史でも 前代未聞:
Though, the fact that the real Cuckoo is
taking part... That's unprecedented.

320450.「そういえば 気になっていたんだけど\n <pc>たちは 俺が 守護天使だって\:
Speaking of which... I was curious to know
if any of you had guessed that I was really
a Guardian Angel.

320451.「もしかして 誰かから守護天使の話を\n 聞いたのかな？: Perhaps someone already told you about them?

320452.<pc>は 守護天使マギエルに言われて\nゼニアスの各地にいる 守護天使を\n捜:
<pc> explains that they are
searching for Guardian Angels in various
places of Zeniath, at the behest of Magiel!

320453.「そうか……マギエル様が……。\n ならば 近いうちに \n 招集があるかもしれ:
I see... It was Magiel... If that's what
happened, then we may be summoned
very soon...

320454.「<pc> これを渡しておくよ。 \n マギエル様から ３つの神器を集めるように:
I'll give this to you, <pc>.
Magiel must have asked you to collect
three divine artifacts.

320456.「<pc>には 本当に助けてもらったから\n 今度は 俺が恩返しをする番だ。\n:
You really helped me this time, so now it's
my turn to help you. If there's anything you
need, you need only call. I'll be there.

320457.「おうおう……ここに集まっておったのか。\n 捜したぞい お前さんたち。:
Ooooh... There you all are. I've been looking
for you.

320458.「またしても お前さんたちに村を救われたでな！\n たんまり 礼をさせてもらいた:
You have saved our village yet again! I've
been meaning to give you plenty of thanks!
Please accept this!

320459.「いやはや トープス！\n まさか あのやんちゃな お前さんが\n 守護天使様だ:
Well, well, Tohpes! To think that a
mischievous boy like you was really a
Guardian Angel!

320460.「どうりで 夢を見ていた時でも ずっと\n お前さんが そばにいてくれたわけだな:
It's no wonder you were always by my side
even in my dreams. I am truly grateful
to you angels.

320461.「やめてよ ロナじいさん！\n 今まで通り ただのトープスで いいってば！:
Stop that, Elder Rona!
I'm just the same old Tohpes!

320462.「んむう……そうかあ？\n お前さんが そうしてほしいなら……:
Hrrmm...is that so?
Well, if that's what you wish...

320463.「トープス！ それにみんなも！\n コッケン音頭が 始まるよーー！:
Tohpes! Everyone! The Cuckoo Dance is
about to start!!

320464.「そんな端っこで 話してないで\n ヤドリギの方に来て みんなで踊ろうよ！:
Don't just stand around talking! Let's go
over to the mistletoe and dance together!

320465.「楽しそう～！ やるやる！\n ほら バルくんも ヒューくんも行こ！:
Sounds fun! Let's do it!
C'mon, Asby! Hyuzie! Let's go!

320466.「ふふっ！ よろこんで！\n ゼクレスの舞踏会では よく踊っていたけど\n みん:
Hmm hmm! Of course! I used to dance a lot
at the Zechres ball, but I've never danced
in a circle with others before!

320467.「あーーいや。\n オレは そういうのはパスするぜ。: Uh, no thanks. I think I'll pass.

320468.「おい お前！ 吾輩をたたえる踊りに\n 参加しないとは 何事じゃ！\n 問答無:
Hey, you! How dare you not participate in this
dance that honors me?! You have no choice,
you must participate! No ifs, ands, or buts!

320469.「お前が 踊る気になるまで\n 離れんぞ！ さあ 踊るのじゃ！:
I will not leave until you decide to dance!
So, go on! Start dancing!

320470.「いてっ！ おい突っつくな！\n わかった！ わかったよ！:
Ouch! Hey, stop that!
All right, all right, I'll do it!

320471.<pc>たちは コッケン音頭を\n踊って 楽しい時を過ごした。:
<pc> and co. have quite the
enjoyable time dancing the Cuckoo
Dance.

320472.メネト村の人々は 守護天使のトープスを\nあたたかく迎え 村人はみな\n久々のコ:
The people of the village warmly welcome Tohpes, the Guardian Angel. The villagers very much enjoyed the festival after so
long...

320473.コッケン祭りは 夜通し続き……\n……そして 夜が明けた！<me 64>:
The Cuckoo Festival continued into the
night...
...and then morning came!<me 64>

320474.残りの守護天使を 目覚めさせるため\nほかの町へ 向かおう。:
Head to another town to awaken the remaining
Guardian Angels.

320475.これで ３人の守護天使を 目覚めさせた。\nはじまりの地へ 戻ろう。:
Now that the three Guardian Angels have been
awakened, head back to the Land of
Beginnings.

321824.「ママが……村のみんなが……！\n ま……ま……真っ黒な影に……:
My mama... Everyone in the village, they're...
I..in a pitch black shadow...

321825.「おい 見にいくぞ。: Hey, let's go have a look.

321826.<pc>は ティセを落ち着かせ\n一緒に 宿屋の外に 向かった！:
<pc> calms Tise down, and together
they head outside of the inn!

321828.「みんな やっと太陽が昇って……\n はりきって コッケン祭りの準備を\n して:
The sun finally came up again...
Everyone was getting ready for the
Cuckoo Festival, too...

321829.「どうして またこんな\n ひどいことが 起きちゃうのよ……。:
Why is such a terrible thing happening
again...?

321830.「村の北側を見回ってみたが 全滅だな。\n アスバル そっちは どうだった？:
I checked up north, and it's completely messed
up. What about you, Asbal?

321831.「こっちも ダメだった。\n 村人どころか 動物たちも全部\n 黒い影になってい:
No good here, either. Not just the villagers,
but even the animals were covered in
black shadows.

321834.「昨日 ママに 村の外に行く許可をもらって……\n それで 早起きして 準備して:
Yesterday, my mama gave me
permission to go outside the village... So
I woke up early to get ready...

321835.「そ……そしたら……ママとパパが\n 急に 何かを すごく怖がりはじめて……:
And...and then...my mama and papa got really
scared about something...

321836.「い……いきなり 黒い霧みたいのに \n 包まれて……それっきり\n 動かなくな:
T...they were covered in a black mist, and...
they stopped moving...

321837.「それで……怖くなって家の外に出たら\n 村のみんなも……。:
So, I...I got scared and ran outside the
house, and now everyone's...

321838.「そうだったんだ……。\n ティセちゃんだけでも 無事でよかった。:
I see... I am glad that you are safe, at
least.

321839.「また……夜が明けなくなってしまったね。\n 今は 本来ならもう\n 朝日が昇っ:
The sun...it still hasn't risen. It should
already be about that time for morning
to come.

321840.「やっぱり……消えたトープスくんのことといい\n 神殿のフクロウを 倒しただけじ:
Just as I thought...Tohpes' disappearance and
us defeating the temple's owls did not
solve this village's problem.

321841.「村にとどまっているのも 危ないかもしれない。\n 急いで 宵の神殿に向かおう。:
It may not be safe to stay here. Let's hurry
to the Temple of Twilight.

324972.<cs_pchero>たちは 悪夢の世界を後にし\n現実のラランブラ山道へ 戻っ:
<cs_pchero> and co. leave the world
of nightmares and return to the real
Larambla Mountain Pass!
